import React, { useState } from 'react'; import logo from '../assets/img/logo.png'; const Navbar = () => { const [isToggled, setIsToggled] = useState(false); // Track if the navbar is toggled // Function to toggle the state const handleToggle = () => { setIsToggled(!isToggled); }; return (
  • setIsToggled(false)} // Close navbar when clicking a link > Inicio
  • setIsToggled(false)} // Close navbar when clicking a link > Testimonios
  • setIsToggled(false)} // Close navbar when clicking a link > Servicios
  • setIsToggled(false)} // Close navbar when clicking a link > Planes
); }; export default Navbar;
